articles.author: Sara Moniuszko
articles.title: Cancer deaths in U.S. fell by 33% in 30 years, but alcohol remains a lesser-known risk factor - CBS News
articles.description: The latest Cancer Progress Report from the American Association for Cancer Research also found a 24% decline in the overall cancer death rate for children and adolescents.
articles.content:
The United States has seen a 33% reduction in the overall cancer death rate from 1991 to 2021, according to the latest Cancer Progress Report.
